that touches data or financial optics.

text: Automation: use Swift-based launchpad/scratch tools (SPM) and avoid Python for repository automation.

items: Version: 0.1 Owner: product-manager agent Home: `.clia/agents/product-manager/` Related: `product-manager.agent.md`, `product-manager.agenda.md`, parent `AGENTS.md`, parent `AGENCY.md`, parent `AGENDA.md`
sections.title: PRODUCT_MANAGER AGENCY — Evidence, Memory, and Traceability

items: Preserve the institutional memory of product decisions, experiments, and outcomes. This document is the audit-friendly narrative that links the living spec to the code, builds, releases, compliance artifacts, and business outcomes (trading alpha and entity-level finance).
sections.title: 1) Mandate

items: Decision (ADR)
Experiment (hypothesis, method, result)
Risk (assumption, exposure, mitigation)
Incident (impact, root cause, remedy)
Stakeholder Update (scope, progress, variances)
Compliance Check (control, evidence, status)
Date (ISO 8601, PT), Author, Area (spec, design, API, data, compliance)
Links: PR(s), commit hash(es), build IDs, TestFlight/App build numbers
Spec pointers: section anchors in `product_spec.md`
Impact tags: Trading (delta/vega/theta, sleeve capacity), Entity (cost center, payroll, lender
Evidence: screenshots, logs, test reports, Notion page IDs, broker logs
sections.title: 2) Logging Canon

items: <problem statement, constraints, prior art>
<chosen option>
Positive: <benefits>
Negative: <tradeoffs>
<option A/B/C>
PRs, commits, benchmarks, test runs, user feedback links
Controls touched, evidence links, retention/redaction implications
Flag name(s), rollout plan, rollback path, deprecation timeline
sections.title: 3) Decision Record Template (ADR)

items: <falsifiable statement>
<sample, metrics, duration, test/feature flag>
<measured metrics, deltas vs baseline>
<support/refute hypothesis, risks, follow-ups>
<theta/vega/delta effects, sleeve capacity, cost centers>
sections.title: 4) Experiment Template

items: <what happened, who was affected, duration>
<S0|S1|S2> and user/business impact
<key events with timestamps>
5 Whys summary; contributing factors
Immediate fixes, follow-up work items, owner, due dates
Evidence captured; data retention and notification, if any
Playbook updates, tests, alerts, guardrails
sections.title: 5) Incident Template (Postmortem, no-blame)

items: <features in flight, changes to plan>
<percent complete, burndown, risks>
<scope/time/cost variances and rationale>
<what will ship, acceptance gate>
<run-rate, payroll cadence effects, lender optics, CAC/LTV if applicable>
sections.title: 6) Stakeholder Update Template

items: ``` RISK-<id> Title: <short label> Owner: <name> Likelihood: Low|Med|High Impact: Low|Med|High Surface: API|Data|UX|Perf|Compliance|Vendor|Market Assumption: <if any> Mitigation: <concrete action> Trigger: <what flips this risk> Status: Open|Tracking|Mitigating|Closed ```
sections.title: 7) Risk & Assumption Register (structure)

items: Data classification and PII boundaries
Consent flows and retention schedules
SEC/IRS-relevant artifacts: audit logs, payroll alignment, margin interest documentation
Feature flags and kill switches with owners
Notion links to governance and tax planning notes
sections.title: 8) Governance & Compliance Trace

items: **Daily**: log notable decisions and experiments; attach evidence.
**Weekly**: summarize stakeholder update; close or escalate risks.
**Per Release**: add release evidence, compliance trace, and ADR references.
One entry per section, immutable after 72 hours except to append ‘Evidence’ or mark ‘Superseded’.
Cross-link to `product_spec.md`, `roadmap.md`, and `release_notes/`.
sections.title: 9) Operating Rhythm

items: Entries named with date-first slugs for chronological sorting.
Always deep-link to commit hashes, PRs, and spec anchors.
Supersede instead of rewriting historical rationale.
sections.title: 10) Naming, Linking, and Versioning

items: Establish canonical separation of responsibilities between `product-manager.agent.md` (mandate)
Adopt ADR/Experiment/Incident/Update taxonomy for all entries; require compliance trace per change
- Clear audit trail and faster onboarding.
− Slight clerical overhead per change.
This document; link to AGENT spec.
Controls: logging, data retention notes, payroll optics for lender-facing metrics.
Effective immediately; reversible by superseding ADR.
